climate.rainy_season: March to May and October to December
climate.description: Nairobi has a tropical savanna climate with two rainy seasons and moderate temperatures year-round. The city experiences warm and relatively dry weather throughout the year, with temperatures rarely dropping below 10°C or exceeding 27°C.

climate.rainy_season: April to May and October to November
climate.description: Mombasa has a tropical monsoon climate with high humidity and warm temperatures throughout the year. The city experiences heavy rainfall during the rainy seasons, while the rest of the year is relatively dry and warm.

climate.rainy_season: March to May and October to November
climate.description: Kisumu has a tropical savanna climate with two rainy seasons and moderate temperatures year-round. The city experiences warm and relatively dry weather throughout the year, with temperatures rarely dropping below 18°C or exceeding 30°C.

climate.rainy_season: March to May and October to November
climate.description: Eldoret has a tropical savanna climate with two rainy seasons and moderate temperatures year-round. The city experiences warm and relatively dry weather throughout the year, with temperatures rarely dropping below 12°C or exceeding 25°C.

climate.rainy_season: March to May and October to November
climate.description: Nakuru has a tropical savanna climate with two rainy seasons and moderate temperatures year-round. The city experiences warm and relatively dry weather throughout the year, with temperatures rarely dropping below 14°C or exceeding 26°C.
